items.text: Try the 酸菜鱼 soup base. It's awesome!
東京の池袋にできるそうです 　我公司在日本的首家商铺现已签订，地址：东京都丰岛区南池袋一丁目21番2号五层、六层，目前该店正在筹备中
By far the best hotpot in Singapore. It is pricey; but the yummy soup base, fresh ingredients and superb service from staff more than makes up for it.
Worth waiting for a table here. The Mala (spicy) broth is packed w/ flavour & the marinated meats are really really good. Skip the Mantou.
The long awaited dinner / supper!! @dicksonlek
My favourite! Great food and great services !

Love the place but had to wait over 1 hr and over 2 hours another time which was a bit ridiculous! Both times we came at 6-7 pm on a Thursday. Best to  come for lunch, no wait. One of the best though!
Sauces will cause you $4/pax. It's ok not to have any sauce 'coz the soup base is really good. Healthier choice!
Fast and good food
No queue at 11pm.
Service super good.
Come during weekday lunch is a breeze. No crowds. Attentive server. Will come again!
Expensive but definitely the best Hotpot in Singapore!
Service is rubbish
Make reservations around 5pm ,otherwise they're too busy to take calls (seriously) we cued and waited 2 hours.
Tomato soup base!
May16: In lift of Trevista @ TPY, residents were excited when they saw Hai Di Lao crew with food bags. Staff then announced to the excited people that he provides Home Delivery of Hai Di Lao Hotpot.
Good service good food . Finally  I have my manicure !
Tomato soup base is the best !
Great food and service. Highly recommended. Do make a reservation or be prepared to wait for 20-30mins for a table.
Very nice hotpot. The service here is super good. If u like spicy hotpot, it is on of best around!
Not bad. A bit over rated I think
Good service & nice food. However I prefer their Shanghai outlet. For whatever reason, I have headache & tummy ache after the hotpot meal. $40+ per pax.
Love the Ma la soup. Must order the hand pulled noodles for their signature dance!
Chicken soup is good!
The spicy soup is really tasty and best for meat. Choose Less Numb option if you are not sure. Mushroom soup is recommended if you can't eat spicy food. Beef and Pork are fresh.
yes get the tomato based soup like everyone says as well the seasoned house beef! good stuff!
Tomato soup is the best
Thumbs up for their 5* service ! Girls can do manicure while waiting and children can play at the playground provided. Ask for blanket if you're cold 😂 and etc....
What a great place for hot pot. Service is really good. It's always crowded & you need to wait most of the time. But they serve you drinks & fruit while waiting. Ladies can even get your nail done :)
Worth the 1.5 hours wait. Very friendly greeters. This is my third time. Love it more in Shanghai though.
Not cheap but while waiting , those thing that keep u happy is great! I guess that even better than China. Anyway in China there is no long q so there isn't a need.
Totally impressed with this place. Child care service, snacks while waiting with herbal tea, mani and pedi! Woot!
They have kungfu la mian too. Order it and watch the shifu perform at your table.
Hotpot.  Soup is spicy!  Order noodles for a good show.
Service is really number 1 here!! And love love love the soup base too. The chicken base is super tasty and mala one is gd too. I like the plum juice too. Will be back for more!
Try to order half portion si that you can eat more varities of dishes
If you're planning to wait 2 hours for dinner only.

Having moved to Singapore after a few years in China, I can say that the Singapore branch does not have anynothing to envy from the one china: chinese hot-pot at his perfection, + some localized items
Excellent service & there beef balls is a must try!

Not the best hot pot I've been to but still tasty & fun. Easy to order by tablet. Helpful & friendly staff. There's live entertainment during the meal & even free manicures while you wait for a table!
👲: The best hotpot in Singapore!
Nice hotpot!
Food is superb! Service is excellent! Though alittle pricey, but will still be back! 加油!
Food is nice, server are nice. The only bad thing here is the long queue..
Super long queue and wait so much so they give free manicure, snacks etc. Quality of food isnt great and quite pricey for what it is, but service is attentive.
Terrific hot pot and you can get your nails done while you wait.
Tang o vegetables
Only one good Chinese hot pot in Clarke Quay area.
Really nice, portions are too big order the half portions!
service is really very good here! I like the tomato soup~ beef is not bad. they actually have pigs brains here! such a rare find~ 😋
super long queue
superb service!
Tomato soup is good but chicken soup is superb! Was extremely impressed by their excellent service! Is a bit pricy but worth the price because the food is fresh! Love the 蝦滑 💕
Excellent service and fresh food!!!
Call to book a place.  Hot location. Price mid high. Average cost 35 to 45 per pax.
Good place but expensive
Extremely good service. A hugely popular and trustworthy brand of hotpot chain from China. Same excellent service standard as I experienced in Beijing! Offers pre-meal snacks, playpen and manicure.
Excellent service. Awesome food. Worth the wait and price.
fresh ingredients. stellar service. over the moon price. but will visit again
Is nice ☺️
Awesome customer service and food is good!
Great service!
Must try the kung-fu noodles!
What a great place for steamboat!!! The beef & potatoes noodle are awesome!
Wifi password: haidilao
It was good but a bit pricey! Well u get the more, if not better device. Eg the hotel for wiping the oil from ur hand

Part of 70+ chain of hotpots fr China. Same level of good dining experience incl iPad ordering, bag covers, etc. Same svcs while u wait (can b v long): manicure, tea & fruits, playroom for little ones
최고의 핫팟!! 혓바닥의 팜므파탈
Tomato soup base is th best
Food + service are superb except that it's alittle pricey. Worth it anyway : )
Fried foo chuk skin dipped in broth!
High-end hotpot place. Pricey but worth the money. Be prepared to queue but you get free snacks while waiting. Free manicures for the ladies.
High quality fresh food..good service, but minimum English
Very good customer service.
Noodle Performance ;-)
They are opened till 6am now!
Can be expensive if u r not careful
Great taste ! great service ever !
Finally i got to try this hotpot! Surprisingly,  i dont have to queue. Straight away jump queue! Song!
Good food good service ...just the  waiting time for the Q is terrible
Must try the sauce name hai di Lao. Mixed by the waitress. Best!!!
Tomato soup is love! It's taste exactly like Tom Yum soup but without the spicyness! Just perfect for me!!
One of the best Chinese hot pot on this planet. Plz try n enjoy. Strongly recommend
They are open till 3am... Great supper place or just good to have yummy hot soup before bed. Mix soup base was $20 though but worth it.
Fabulous in every way!
Tasty food without much msg. Pricey but great for gathering!
Anybody who ask for steamboat, shall be hai di laoooooo!
This is a must try!
The place to be! Superb service and great food! Only 10 minutes of waiting in Thursday evening. After one of our drinking glass exploded by itself, got a free dessert and a souvenir plate.
